languages.text: "Пускай бригадиры договорятся с вандалами. Потратим немного тронов и избежим проблем".
"Let the foremen negotiate with the Vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."
languages.original_text: "Пускай бригадиры договорятся с вандалами. Потратим немного тронов и избежим проблем".

traits.locale_text: "Let the brigadiers negotiate with the vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid the problem."
"Let the brigadiers negotiate with the vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid the problem."
"Let the brigadiers negotiate with the vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."
"Let the brigadiers negotiate with the vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."
"Let the foremen negotiate with the Vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."
"Let the foremen negotiate with the Vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."

languages.text: “让我们的领班和引擎破坏者谈判吧，我们可以花些王座币来避免问题恶化。”
languages.original_text: "Let the foremen negotiate with the Vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."

traits.locale_text: “让我们的领班和引擎破坏者谈判吧，我们可以花些王座币来避免问题恶化。”

languages.text: «Dejemos que los capataces negocien con los vándalos. Podemos invertir unos tronos y evitar estos problemas por completo».
languages.original_text: "Let the foremen negotiate with the Vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."

traits.locale_text: «Dejemos que los capataces negocien con los vándalos. Podemos invertir unos tronos y evitar estos problemas por completo».

languages.text: 「准将に破壊者との交渉を任せればいい。王座の力を使えば、このような問題を一斉に回避することができるよう」
languages.original_text: "Let the foremen negotiate with the Vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."

traits.locale_text: 「准将に破壊者との交渉を任せればいい。王座の力を使えば、このような問題を一斉に回避することができるよう」
「准将に破壊者との交渉を任せればいい。王座の力を使えば、このような問題を一斉に回避することができるよう」

languages.text: « Laissons les chefs d'équipe négocier avec les Vandales, ça nous permettra d'éviter tout un tas de problèmes. »
languages.original_text: "Let the foremen negotiate with the Vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."

traits.locale_text: « Laissons les chefs d'équipe négocier avec les Vandales, ça nous permettra d'éviter tout un tas de problèmes. »

languages.text: "Die Vorarbeiter sollen mit den Vandalen verhandeln. Wir können ein paar Thronmünzen investieren und diese Probleme vollkommen vermeiden."
languages.original_text: "Let the foremen negotiate with the Vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."

traits.locale_text: "Die Vorarbeiter sollen mit den Vandalen verhandeln. Wir können ein paar Thronmünzen investieren und diese Probleme vollkommen vermeiden."
"Die Brigadiere sollen mit den Vandalen verhandeln. Wir können ein paar Thronmünzen investieren und diese Probleme vollkommen vermeiden."

languages.text: "Ustabaşılar, Vandallarla müzakere yapsın. Biraz nüfuz kullanıp bu sorunlardan tamamıyla kaçınabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Let the foremen negotiate with the Vandals. We can spend some thrones and avoid these problems altogether."
